channel.title: Make XP Look Like Ubuntu
channel.description:
[size=20pt]DO EXACTLY AS I TELL YOU IF YOU WANT TO DO THIS EXACTLY CORRECTLY[/size]
STEP 1: Download UXPATCHER and HUMAN.ZIP [url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/qhpb7e]UXPATCHER[/url] [url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/lbtthg]HUMAN>ZIP[/url] STEP 2: EXECUTE UXPATCHER AND FOLLOW ITS INSTRUCTIONS, I KNOW YOU WILL NOT READ IT SO LIKE IT SAYS ONCE THE WINDOWS DIALOG POPS UP SAYING TO INSERT YOUR WINDOWS CD BECAUSE IT IS MISSING ONE OF ITS ORIGINAL FILES......... [size=12pt][b]PRESS CANCEL[/b][/size]. STEP 3: REBOOT YOUR COMPUTER AS IT PROMOTES YOU TO DO. STEP 4: DO WHAT THE UXPATCHER TELLS YOU TO DO STEP 5: UNZIP HUMAN.ZIP TO [code]C:\WINDOWS\Resources\Themes[/code] STEP 6: RIGHT CLICK ON YOUR DESKTOP CLICK PREFERENCES > CLICK APPEARANCE > UNDER WINDOWS AND BUTTONS CHOOSE HUMAN AND CLICK APPLY. STEP 7: THANK ME FOR MAKING YOUR COMPUTER LOOK LIKE UBUNTU. STEP 8: LOOK AT THE PICUTRE BELOW AND MAKE SURE IT LOOKS LIKE YOUR DESKTOP. STEP 9: Optional IF YOU WANT YOUR COMPUTER TO REALLY LOOK LIKE UBUNTU MOVE THE TASK BAR TO THE TOP OF THE SCREEN.[size=22pt]<<<<<[/size] [center]SCREEN SHOT BELOW THIS SENTENCE [/center] WAS THIS GUIDE IDIOT PROOF ENOUGH???
DEECOY IS A FUCKING NOOB SORRY FOR THE RANDOM NESS
[img]http://img28.picoodle.com/img/img28/8/6/21/f_untitledm_c4cfd86.jpg[/img]

item.title: Make XP Look Like Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:8, topic:114537”][quote author=llib link=topic=163729.msg1541434#msg1541434 date=1182760903]
This is cool!

*opens up another tab to google to find more themes

I hated useing windowblinds slowed my comp down, this is a life saver!
[/quote]

Thats because your computer sucks and you had a virus.[/quote]

Yea the virus was called “windowblinds” -.- reponsible for: slowing my computer down and completely ruining the default themes on my comp

Read full topic

Why use xp?

Get Linux and you can make it look like xp without all the gay insecurity and suckiness.

item.title: Make XP Look Like Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[size=20pt]DO EXACTLY AS I TELL YOU IF YOU WANT TO DO THIS EXACTLY CORRECTLY[/size]

STEP 1: Download UXPATCHER and HUMAN.ZIP
UXPATCHER
HUMAN>ZIP
STEP 2: EXECUTE UXPATCHER AND FOLLOW ITS INSTRUCTIONS, I KNOW YOU WILL NOT READ IT SO LIKE IT SAYS ONCE THE WINDOWS DIALOG POPS UP SAYING TO INSERT YOUR WINDOWS CD BECAUSE IT IS MISSING ONE OF ITS ORIGINAL FILES… [size=12pt]PRESS CANCEL[/size].
STEP 3: REBOOT YOUR COMPUTER AS IT PROMOTES YOU TO DO.
STEP 4: DO WHAT THE UXPATCHER TELLS YOU TO DO
STEP 5: UNZIP HUMAN.ZIP TO C:\WINDOWS\Resources\Themes
STEP 6: RIGHT CLICK ON YOUR DESKTOP CLICK PREFERENCES > CLICK APPEARANCE > UNDER WINDOWS AND BUTTONS CHOOSE HUMAN AND CLICK APPLY.
STEP 7: THANK ME FOR MAKING YOUR COMPUTER LOOK LIKE UBUNTU.
STEP 8: LOOK AT THE PICUTRE BELOW AND MAKE SURE IT LOOKS LIKE YOUR DESKTOP.
STEP 9: Optional IF YOU WANT YOUR COMPUTER TO REALLY LOOK LIKE UBUNTU MOVE THE TASK BAR TO THE TOP OF THE SCREEN.[size=22pt]<<<<<[/size]

WAS THIS GUIDE IDIOT PROOF ENOUGH???
